column4: Hi .. I have installed ubuntu  10.10  32bit version on my  laptop .. is this possible to upgrade to 63bit ubuntu without reformatting harddisk and preserve old data ?
so i have to download 64bit and install freshly ?
however you can save your home directory and reload it after you've installed all of your apps again in the 64bit system
I would, because of the pae support in 32bit and also because 64bit libraries can run along side them too
